price: Wͻkeka sε: “Ahummͻborͻ Hene no awo ba. Kronkron Hene ne no. Daabi, wͻn (a wͻka sε wͻyε Nyankopͻn mma tesε soro abͻfoͻ ne Yesu no nyinaa) yε (Nyankopͻn) nkoa animuonyamfoͻ.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۚ بَلۡ عِبَادٞ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-raḥmānu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal ʿibādun muk'ramūna
